title: Noragami OVA
synopsis: Hiyori Iki is excited to start high school alongside her two middle school friends, but "Delivery God" Yato seems to have other plans for the day. Will Hiyori be able to make a good impression on her first day? Or will Yato cost her a happy high school life?
voices: ['Kamiya, Hiroshi', 'Kaji, Yuki', 'Uchida, Maaya', 'Sawashiro, Miyuki', 'Toyosaki, Aki', 'Fukuyama, Jun', 'Ono, Daisuke', 'Inoue, Kazuhiko', 'Hayami, Saori']
